responses.message: Hello, {Sender_Name}! My name is {Bot_Name}, created by <@U4GU2V4RH>.

Well hello there, welcome to *NetSecFocus!*
Have a look through the guidelines: https://netsecfocus.com/netsec-focus-guidelines/
To save clogging up chat with autoresponses go to your Direct Messages to yourself (left-hand side, Direct Messages, $user (you) and you can try the following: !oscpinvite !rules, !learn and a myriad of other responses. Enjoy.

*OSCP Invite:*
In order to be invited, direct message {Bot_Name} a exact copy of the following sentence:
> I confirm I am enrolled into the PWK course or passed my OSCP exam.
 _*NOTICE:* We're not affiliated with offsec, this is strictly a community effort._

conditions.condition: I confirm I am enrolled into the PWK course or passed my OSCP exam.

responses.message:
You were invited to the OSCP group. Please note the following rules:
*1.* No spoilers 
*2.* No irrelevant discussions/offtopic chatter (okay in threads) 
*3.* Research before asking (http://www.catb.org/esr/faqs/smart-questions.html#before) 
*4.* NO DIRECT QUESTIONS ON MACHINES 
*5.* No shitposting/memes 
*6.* Try harder 
*7.* Don't add members to the channel, instead ask an admin.
 *NOTE:* People blatantly ignoring the rules will either get warned or kicked out from the channel.
